title: Therapy log
description: Each entry describes an instance of a therapy treatment.

calendar_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date of the therapy.

timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of the therapy.

person_id.description: the person to who underwent the therapy treatment.

body_site_code.description: This enumeration includes all codes from FHIR's body-site definition http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/body-site.

diagnosis_id.description: Reference to the diagnosis requiring the therapy treatment.

therapy_name.description: A textual name of the therapy e.g. massage.

therapy_sctid.description: SNOWMED CT ID referencing a surgical procedure

duration_minutes.description: duration in minutes for the therapy treatment
